comments.author: sajid dadabhoy
comments.content:
Taimur Sahib, Tanya, KO, Doc and the team

Wonderful work. I would have certainly joined your team had I known about your efforts.

Let me know if I could be of any help.

Sajid

comments.author: khalid Mahmood
comments.content:
Taimur and Tanya Mirza:

Great work and a great report. This is truly a service as well as an adventure. Thank you for undertaking this and for reporting.

I would like to be of some help in operations such as these, as i have marine motors and inflatables and skilled manpower. Pleae let me know in case a future need or occasion arises.

Khalid Mahmood

comments.author: Engr. k.h.barlaas
comments.content:
I want some evidence of flood water depth in Gaawadar district that resulted from cyclone of 2007 .. in the context of my cuurent research work regarding my flood modelling thesis in civil engineering….so that I may compare the results of my work to those of actual depth….

… I mean any report or news or public announcement…

Thanks
